name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time

game.exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time/PrinceOfPersia.EXE

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Please select the GOG installer
game:
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Prince of Persia - The Sands of Time/PrinceOfPersia.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2003 win7
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
